snippet: President Juan Manuel Santos on Tuesday rejected a call by a new rebel leader to revive failed peace talks from a decade ago and instead called on the rebels to take real steps toward peace.
abstract: Colombian Pres Juan Manuel Santos rejects a call by a new rebel leader to revive failed peace talks from a decade ago; insurgency is at its weakest point in years following crackdown.
lead_paragraph: President Juan Manuel Santos on Tuesday rejected a call by a new rebel leader to revive failed peace talks from a decade ago and instead called on the rebels to take real steps toward peace.
